1.0.0.name: wordpress/gravity-forms-capsulecrm-add-on
1.0.0.description:
This plugin make the link beetween wordpress and capsuleCRM the web CRM via the forms provided by Gravity. It requires CapsuleCRM and the premium version of the Gravity Forms plugin.

Integrate CapsuleCRM with Gravity Forms

No more cutting and pasting data from one screen to another.

When you get form filled a lead will already be in your CapsuleCRM.

Simply install our free plugin, activate it, and you are moments away from taking your lead forms to the next level.

Gravity Forms CapsuleCRM Add-on will capture the following fields:

  • Name
  • Organization
  • Email
  • Address
  • Phone Number

Anything else will be added to a note field.

This plugin is free to use and configure you how you like. We ask that if you use and
